methods.name: getRecord
methods.comment: Gets the category record for the given ID.

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the key into the catagory table

return.comment: the record for the given ID or null if no record with that id exists.

methods.name: updateRecord
methods.comment: Updates the record in the database

methods.name: getRecordIdsWithParent
methods.comment: Returns a list of categoryIDs that have the given parent ID.

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the key into the catagory table

return.comment: an array of categoryIDs that have the specified parent

methods.name: createCategory
methods.comment: Creates a new category with the given name and parent ID.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the new category.

return.comment: a new record for the new category.

methods.name: removeCategory
methods.comment: Removes the category with the given ID.

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the key into the category table

return.comment: true if the a category with that id existed.

methods.javadoc: Get the record for the root category.
methods.name: getRootRecord
methods.comment: Get the record for the root category.
